thread.title: Orphaned Baby Possum snuggles toy kangaroo: Photos and video go viral
thread.title_full: Orphaned Baby Possum snuggles toy kangaroo: Photos and video go viral

author: Shweta Parande
title: Orphaned Baby Possum snuggles toy kangaroo: Photos and video go viral
text:
Orphaned Baby Possum snuggles toy kangaroo: Photos and video go viral By Shweta Parande on October 9, 2015 at 10:55 AM Comments 
Photos and video of an orphaned baby possum snuggling her toy kangaroo have gone viral! Watching the little joey playing with the toy kangaroo and holding on to it tight really breaks your heart. Mashable reports that a female brushtail possum joey was found orphaned in Sydney, Australia. The four-month-old was suffering from dehydration and is being taken care of at the Taronga Wildlife Hospital since September. 
The baby possum is expected to be released back into the wild as soon as she recovers. But she obviously has no idea of her stardom which she attained thanks to the viral pictures and video! 
The little possum looks so cute cuddling her stuffed kangaroo toy, as if it were a real kangaroo! You are sure to go ‘Aww’ watching this video! The marsupial will melt your heart. Take a look. (Photo courtesy: Taronga Wildlife Hospital.) 
  11:04 AM Topics:
